name: CXXLanguageStandard
desc: The supported C++ language standards to use for compiling C++ sources in the package.

items.name: case cxx03
items.desc: The identifier for the C++03 language standard.

items.name: case cxx11
items.desc: The identifier for the C++11 language standard.

items.name: case cxx14
items.desc: The identifier for the C++14 language standard.

items.name: case cxx98
items.desc: The identifier for the C++98 language standard.

items.name: case gnucxx03
items.desc: The identifier for the GNU++03 language standard.

items.name: case gnucxx11
items.desc: The identifier for the GNU++11 language standard.

items.name: case gnucxx14
items.desc: The identifier for the GNU++14 language standard.

items.name: case gnucxx98
items.desc: The identifier for the GNU++98 language standard.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the C++ language standard by feeding the item into the given hasher.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value for the C++ language standard.

items.name: static func != (CXXLanguageStandard, CXXLanguageStandard) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: init?(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: typealias CXXLanguageStandard.RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.
